name: Sleepy in the Clouds Prototype
description:
This is a silly platformer prototype I made by myself on Godot. Wait for a better and bigger version, soon™!

Yeah, I know the title screen looks really lonely, turns out I'm not very good at drawing clouds. There were supposed to be more songs too, but there was an accident and I didn't manage to remake them (yet)!

What's that? The times are way too easy?! Well I was testing the game under heavy lag and didn't realize the difference it made.

If you do play it, tell me your thoughts! Your input just might be valuable when I make a full version.

Update: I've been made aware saving does not work on either build. I'll be fixing that shortly. Saving now should work both on Windows and Linux! Download the latest version!

Changelog:

v1.03 - fixed bugs: knockback by spider shots during invincibility frames, surviving when falling through the bottom of the screen during invincibility frames, being able to walk on spikes without taking damage upon walking on them during invincibility frames

v1.02 - fixed collision for death barrier in stage 10 that made it so players would fall indefinitely

v1.01 - fixed error that made it impossible to save the game
